title: Citroen returns to SA with 3 new cars, 2019 Porsche Macan Turbo in a blink - Top models of the week
text:
Citroen has officially made its comeback into the South African market with a trio of new models in the line-up.

Fancy purchasing a high-performance luxury SUV? Look no further than the Porsche Macan Turbo - here's all you need to know about the automaker's latest SUV offering.

Top new models

Toyota sprinkled some of its Gazoo Racing performance magic on the Daihatsu Copen with a Japanese-only roadster.

WATCH | SA-bound BMW 2 Series Gran Coupé breaks cover

The Range Rover SV Autobiography Dynamic Edition is the brand's latest luxury SUV offering, boasting impressive technologies, and the performance to match.

BMW is adding the 2-Series Gran Coupe to its line-up, and it's heading to South Africa.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: Here's all you need to know about the new Porsche Macan Turbo, while Citroen is making its comeback into the South African market with three new models.
